programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: Two people (Bradford Dillman, Heather Menzies) unwittingly free a mad military scientist's (Kevin McCarthy) mutant fish near a summer camp and resort lake.

programme.title: Humanoids From the Deep
programme.desc: A fisherman (Doug McClure) and a scientist (Ann Turkel) fight back when mossy sea monsters assault women.

programme.title: Sleepaway Camp
programme.desc: Bunks and the showers are a mad stabber's beat at a summer camp strictly for teens.

programme.title: Attack of the Giant Leeches
programme.desc: A bartender sends his wife (Yvette Vickers) and her lover (Michael Emmet) into a swamp where large smart leeches lurk.

programme.title: Becoming Evil: Cult of Personality
programme.sub-title: Buddy Serial Killing: The Hillside Stranglers and the Beltway Snipers
programme.desc: An exploration of the horrific idea of friends sharing in the disgusting thrill of serial murder.

programme.title: Nightwish
programme.desc: Coeds (Alisha Das, Elizabeth Kaitan) enter a nightmarish world by way of a deep-sleep researcher's experiments.

programme.title: Road Games
programme.desc: An Australian trucker (Stacy Keach) picks up a hitchhiking heiress (Jamie Lee Curtis) and the trail of a killer in a green van.

programme.title: Homebound
programme.desc: A trip to the countryside turns frightening for a father and his new fiancee when they arrive to find his ex-wife missing and the kids acting strange.

programme.title: Beast From Haunted Cave
programme.desc: A gold thief and his crew hole up in a skier's lodge and come across a scary monster covered in cobwebs.

programme.title: The Island
programme.desc: Evelin and her small purpose group want to leave the island as soon as possible, and they plan to capture the ship of pirates who come to pillage once a week.

programme.title: The Island
programme.desc: The escape plan of Evelin and her group is in jeopardy, as new challenges arise that threaten their plan to reach the mainland.

programme.desc: After losing her friends in a zombie attack, Barbara must survive naked with only a chainsaw.
